mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTER ( lett_no, lett_sid, mem_id, lett_title, lett_time, lett_content ) VALUES( LETT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{lett_sid}, #{mem_id}, #{lett_title}, SYSDATE, #{lett_content})
mapper.select: SELECT GS.COM_ID, TO_CHAR(GB_TIME,'YYYY/MM') "GB_TIME" , SUM(GS.GO_PRICE * GD.CART_QTY) "GB_PAYMENT" FROM GBUYDETAIL GD, GOODS GS, GBUYER GB WHERE GD.GO_NO= GS.GO_NO AND GB.GB_NO = GD.GB_NO AND TO_CHAR(GB.GB_TIME, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GB_TIME,'YYYY/MM'), GS.COM_ID HAVING COM_ID=#{com_id} ORDER BY 2

SELECT GS.COM_ID, TO_CHAR(GB_TIME,'YYYY/MM/DD') "GB_TIME" , SUM(GS.GO_PRICE * GD.CART_QTY) "GB_PAYMENT" FROM GBUYDETAIL GD, GOODS GS, GBUYER GB WHERE GD.GO_NO= GS.GO_NO AND GB.GB_NO = GD.GB_NO AND TO_CHAR(GB.GB_TIME, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GB_TIME,'YYYY/MM/DD'), GS.COM_ID HAVING COM_ID=#{com_id} ORDER BY 2
